title: Çigköftem
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Fast food, Take-out, Catering, Middle Eastern, Turkish
description: Part of the large franchise chain. Offers a vegan vegetable pate made of grains, walnuts, tomato puree, sunflower oil, parsley and green onions that are shaped into little balls or fingers and put in wraps or with mixed plates. This particular location is vegetarian and vegan only, with the majority of items (90%) being vegan. Uses butter in dessert and has some yogurt items in the cooler. Opened late 2014.
streetAddress: 20 Rue De Vieux Marche Aux Vins
